Name: Keyser Söze
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin and cognac sit surprisingly well together as base ingredients with gentian and citrus freshness.
History: Keyser Söze is a fictional character and the main protagonist in the 1995 film The Usual Suspects, while Suze, spelt with a 'u', is the bittersweet gentian flavoured liqueur and main protagonist in this cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Keyser Söze contains 192 calories
